automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_light_auto_dim_after_8_pm'
alias: Living Room Light - Auto Dim After 8 PM
description: "Dim the Living Room Light to 40% brightness when turned on after 8 PM"
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
    from: "off"
    to: "on"
condition:
  - condition: time
    after: "20:00:00"
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 40
